title: Did the NRA Oppose Reauthorization of the Violence Against Women Act in April 2019?
subtitle: While the gun rights group says they support the main thrust of the Violence Against Women Act, they oppose amendments that lower the criminal threshold to bar someone from buying a gun.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: In April 2019, when the U.S. House of Representatives voted to reauthorize the Violence Against Women Act, the NRA opposed the move due to the addition of amendments that would lower the criminal threshold required to bar someone from buying a gun.
